means: 失败（ founder的过去式和过去分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: The talks have foundered, largely because of the reluctance of some members of the government to do a deal with criminals.
sentence.Network_cn: 对话已经破裂了，原因主要是因为一些政府成员不愿意和犯罪分子达成协议。

sentence.Network_en: Three ships foundered in heavy seas.
sentence.Network_cn: 三艘船在波涛汹涌的海面上沉没了。

sentence.Network_en: The project foundered as a result of lack of finance.
sentence.Network_cn: 该项目因缺乏资金而告吹.

PerfectNetExp.abs: one year ago : 280 people were killed when a ferry fire and foundered off the coast of eastern China's Shandong province .一年前的今天，280人因一起发生在中国山东东部海面的渡轮失火及沉没事件中丧身。
The collision foundered the ship ., 撞击使该船进水沉没.
Previous negotiations foundered on European objections to America ' s limits on foreign ownership of airlines ., 欧盟在先前的谈判设定的前提是 , 反对美国在航空公司所有权上对外方的限制.

founderous 易使人摔倒的founders shares 创建人股份foundling 弃儿
foundation 底座founder breccia 塌积角砾岩founder 奠基者
建立者效应(Founder effect)——在一个快速扩增的群体中，祖先的小人群中有一个或更多的建立者恰好是某一突变基因的携带者，那 …
奠基者效应（founder effect）是遗传漂变的一种形式，指由带有亲代群体中部分等位基因的少数个体重新建立新的群体，这个群体后 …

entry.def: The founder of an institution, organization, or building is the person who got it started or caused it to be built, often by providing the necessary money.

example.ex: He was one of the founders of the university's medical faculty.
example.tran: 他是该大学医学院的创建人之一。

entry.def: If something such as a plan or project founders, it fails because of a particular point, difficulty, or problem.

example.ex: The talks have foundered, largely because of the reluctance of some members of the government to do a deal with criminals.
example.tran: 对话已经破裂了，原因主要是因为一些政府成员不愿意和犯罪分子达成协议。

entry.def: If a ship founders, it fills with water and sinks.

example.ex: Three ships foundered in heavy seas.
example.tran: 三艘船在波涛汹涌的海面上沉没了。

auth_sentence.content: Shock foundered Eric, sent him silly all over.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shock foundered Eric, sent him silly all over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shock foundered Eric, sent him silly all over.

auth_sentence.content: Since then, though, her enthusiasm has foundered.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since then, though, her enthusiasm has foundered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since then, though, her enthusiasm has foundered.

auth_sentence.content: In the nineteen-eighties, the institute foundered, then disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the nineteen-eighties, the institute foundered, then disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the nineteen-eighties, the institute foundered, then disappeared.
